name: Tongue Depressor
specifications: Disposable wooden or plastic stick with smooth edges; approximately 15 cm long and 2 cm wide.
function: Depresses the tongue for oral and pharyngeal examinations.
usage: Wash hands and wear gloves; use one depressor per patient; gently press the tongue downward while inspecting the mouth or throat.
maintenance: Dispose after single use; do not reuse; store unused depressors in a clean container.
warning: Reusing depressors or rough handling, which may cause gagging or discomfort.
